title: Personalized Online Interactive Course for Learning Complex Dynamic Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Language application course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain core components of CDS with 85% accuracy

Learners demonstrate cognitive developmental stages by achieving 75+ points consecutively in three formative assessments
